title: Amazon's Game Streaming Service Luna is Real - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.24.20
description:
Blessing and Greg talk about the cost of PS5 and Xbox Series X storage devices for a long time, and then at the end of the Roper Report, Amazon drops a bomb -- its own streaming service called Luna!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:12:00 - Housekeeping
WWE 2K Battlegrounds on youtube.com/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Tom Bock, & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:14:00 - Xbox Storage Is Expensive, Tom Warren @ The Verge
00:26:30 - Mafia Definitive Edition Review Round-Up
00:33:40 - Among Us 2 Canceled for Among Us 1, Jordan Ramee @ GameSpot
00:37:28 - Hideo Kojima, Jon Favreau Among Tribeca Film Festival's New Gaming Advisory Board, Jonathan Dornbush @ IGN
00:39:45 -  Kirby Fighters 2 is out now for Nintendo Switch, Ryan Gilliam @ Polygon
00:45:38 - BREAKING NEWS: Amazon Luna
01:02:03 -  Logitech 
01:03:38 -  KLARNA 
01:04:54 -  Hello Fresh
01:06:35 - Out today
01:12:45 - Squad Up:Mark Freeman(Zoom/Twitter) - @theindieboy1
01:13:55 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Tim
